title: Looking for Accommodation
content: Can you guys suggest any good accomodation near Pes University, RR Campus ?

comments.body: Same here. Please do share the name and location of nearby accomodations....

Thereâ€™s hostel, lot of pgs around, can always rent

There are two flats around pes where it is mostly pes students one is vasundra and other skyline
